title: Forest Descent: Anime Downhill Thrill
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, Modern Anime style illustration, A dynamic full-body shot of a professional mountain biker racing intensely down a rugged, sun-dappled forest trail. The biker wears a sleek, futuristic protective suit in orange and cyan/teal, a full-face black helmet, and reflective goggles. Extreme speed is shown by exaggerated motion blur, glowing cyan and yellow speed lines, and a large dust cloud kicking up from the rear tire. Dramatic lighting with bright god rays piercing through the dense green forest canopy, highlighting the action. Vertical composition (9:16), action pose, sharp lines, cinematic perspective, highly saturated colors.
